conclusion: Mass of the rod, m = 10 g = 0.01 kg
Length of the rod, L = 50 cm = 0.5 m
The rod is in equilibrium, so the net force acting on it is zero.
The forces acting on the rod are the gravitational force, the magnetic force, and the tension in the string.
Since the tension in the string is zero, the gravitational force and the magnetic force must balance each other.
